Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: ~bmos299 this seems like there should be lots of discrete fixes submitted as change requests, yet while it says in progress, hard to tell that any progress has been made.

Action.author: jimthematrix
Action.body: it's a worthy task and we'd like to get to it by the end of v1.0 for sure. but it's definitely not of "Highest" priority. Lowering to "Medium"
